author: Daniel Greene
description:
A new Wheel of Time open-world RPG has been announced... and the studio behind it? Yep, it’s iwot/Red Eagle—the same group with a notoriously bad track record handling this beloved franchise.

This game promises a massive AAA experience across the entire Wheel of Time world. But with the same names behind the failed pilot, broken promises, and IP mismanagement? I’m not buying the hype. Let’s break down everything we know—and everything that should worry fans.

📚 Article Source:
Variety – Wheel of Time Open-World RPG in Development

🎮 Key points:

AAA open-world RPG in early development

Aiming to release on PC and console within 3 years

Studio behind it has deep ties to the worst parts of Wheel of Time’s adaptation history

Part of a bigger IWot media push including an Age of Legends film and 3D animated feature

⚠️ Let’s talk about whether this is a second chance… or just history repeating itself.

📚 My Books:

Neon Ghosts: https://shop.wraithmarked.com/collections/standard-editions
title: "A TOTAL DISGRACE" – Wheel of Time Video Game Announced by Same People Who Botched It Before
